content.text: Hi there, what are you up to today?
I'm just finishing up a project for work. I start working with my brother in law in Hollywood soon.
Oh wow, that sounds exciting! Are you nervous at all?
A little bit, but it's a good feeling. I'm ready for a change.
That's great! I'm sure you'll do great. What kind of work do you do?
Oh cool! What kind of roles do you like to play?
I like to play characters that are different from me. I'm not very good at math, so I like to play characters who are really good at it.
That's interesting! I'm not good at math either. I like to play characters that are funny.
I like to play funny characters too!
What kind of things do you like to do for fun?
I love going to the gym, eating at McDonald's, and visiting thrift shops.
Oh cool! I love going to the gym too. I'm not a big fan of McDonald's, but I love thrift shopping.
Thrift shopping is the best! I can always find something interesting.
Me too! I love finding unique pieces of clothing.
I'm glad we have some things in common.
Me too! We should hang out sometime.
